metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7045 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The format_send_to_gui function in the format parsing code in Irssi before0.8.20 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heapcorruption and crash) via vectors involving the length of a string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: irssi package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.2').
